summary: A dragonbone greatsword version of \'747823\' Umbra bastardsword replacer
descriptionHtml:
Source:  
The very talented \'747823\' created an awesome replacer for the ebony greatsword. An Umbra bastard sword I used from the beginning. So if you like the basic look of the sword give him some well deserved endorsments there: 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3871

Please endorse me here if you like my version. (note: No additional files needed, its a standalone version)

Now with his permission to made this mod, here is what I have done with it: 
For my character I created a variant of that cool sword that fits more to my own dragonbone themed armor set you can see here: 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3557

Idea:
The visual goal was to give it a mammoth tusk grip with dragonbone guard and a hardend damast steelblade. Also a leathergrip with dragonblood dyre to give it some color.

Mesh changes (compared to the Umbra version):
I scaled up the sword to upgrade it from a bastard sword to a full greatsword. I\'ve done that because that way it fits better in my character concept of having a heavy weapons guy.
Since the blade is supposed to be damast I added more reflexion to the blade itself than in the original. The player character now holds the weapon closer to the guard while using it. I think its more appropriate to handle the more heavier greatsword version.

Hope you like it!

Note: It\'s still an ebony greatsword replacer with the stats unchanged. Upgrading the sword at the forge will still need ebon ignots etc.

Update 1.1:
- fixxed dislocated blood mesh and effekts on the sword
- doubled the metallic reflection effect on the blade itself.
- added reflection on detailed parts

===INSTALLATION===
  
Extract into your Skyrim directory. 
(C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data)


===UNINSTALL===
To uninstall Go to 
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\ebony\\ and delete
\"1stpersonebonygreatsword.nif\" 
\"ebonygreatsword.nif\"
and in 
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\ delete the
\"74_w\" folder


Thanks to \'747823\' for giving me his permission to share this mod.
author: feuerkorn
